title: Almodovar's Bad Education Explores Dark Thriller Territory
summary: A complex 2004 Spanish thriller exploring identity, abuse and revenge through melodramatic lens
content: melodramatic and perverse Spanish thriller from 2004, directed by Pedro Almodovar, runs 1 hour 46 minutes, received 7.4/10 on IMDb and 88% on Rotten Tomatoes, tells suspenseful story with dark themes
